content:
In the lead-up to the working group review meeting (in 8 days), I was thinking it'd be good to do a bit of a survey. @pnkfelix do you want me to make a quick google form? Do you want to? I was imagining we would ask some open-ended questions

  • Can we publish these responses publicly (default to yes)
  • What are some things you think we should start doing?
  • What are some things you think we should stop doing?
  • What are some things you think we should keep doing?
  • What are some things you think we should do differently?
  • Any other comments?

but maybe it'd be nice to include some 1...10 results for a few things? I'm thinking back to what our goals were with establishing working groups, we could check-in on how well we think those goals are being met.
A survey is probably a good idea
I don't think I could put it together today. So if you want it out soon, you should probably take care of it.
but if it can wait until tomorrow, then I can probably put something together
